Classes in gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components used by gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components
AxisInfo
          This class groups all of the information about an axis into one object.
IBoundsList3D
          IBoundsList3D provides bounding information for three dimensional points.
IMutableVirtualArray2D
          This interface defines methods to set values and error values for elements of an IVirtualArray2D.
IPhysicalArray3D
          This interface extends the ISparseArray3D and IBoundsList3D interfaces to add information about each point's three dimensional volume surrounding the point.
IPhysicalArray3DList
          This interface extends the ISparseArray3DList and IBounds3DList interfaces to add information about each point's three dimensional volume surrounding the point.
IPointList3D
          This interface is intended for classes that must store scattered three dimensional points.
IPreserveState
          This interface is required by any class that uses the ObjectState class to preserve state information.
ISparseArray3D
          This interface extends IPointList3D to include values for scattered three dimensional points.
ISparseArray3DList
          This interface is intended for classes that must store scattered three dimensional mappings of data that change through frames.
IVirtualArray
          This interface defines methods common to all virtual arrays, whether or not the values of the virtual array can be changed.
IVirtualArray2D
          This interface is implemented by classes that can produce a "logical" 2-D array of floats and is used to pass data to viewers and view components.
IVirtualArrayList1D
          This interface is implemented by classes that can produce a "logical" list of one dimensional functions or histograms, represented by arrays of values.
ObjectState
          This class is used to preserve the state of on object.
PointList3D
          PointList3D stores scattered three dimensional points.
 

Classes in gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components used by gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.Cursor
IPreserveState
          This interface is required by any class that uses the ObjectState class to preserve state information.
ObjectState
          This class is used to preserve the state of on object.
